text: Lake Anosy ("Lac Anosy" in French) is a man-made lake, also known as a reservoir, in Madagascar. It is in Antananarivo, the capital city of Madagascar. It is in southern Antananarivo and has a small island in the middle with a monument and statue on it. The monument and statue commemorate those who died during World War 1. Lake Anosy used to be a swamp but it was replaced in 1830. ==References== Category:Geography of Madagascar Category:Lakes of Africa
title: Lake Anosy
